评论概述: Cute and good for work or casual
评论详情: Let’s just say the color is so pretty and the fit is very flattering. Can’t wait to wear it soon.
This for me to a T.  It's a great length on me.  I'm 5'6 and 160 lbs.  The top layer is so pretty but my favorite is the sleeves.  I love the sleeve.  It makes this top!

This is a nice shirt.  The color is very nice and if you like sparkles you will like this shirt.  This shirt is well made and nice the 3/4 sleeves are nice and kinda a little fluffy at the sleeve.  this shirt was a little tight but all in all a nice shirt.  This shirt washes well and i hung up the shirt to dry and no issues with rips or tears.  Well made shirt with good color

I ws worried the lace sleeves on this would be a bit scratchy, but was pleasantly surprised to discover that they are made of a soft, stretchy lace that was comfortable to wear.  The sizing was good and the length was nice as well.  It is dressy but not too formal.  I wore it with black slacks and was happy with the overall look--and certainly the feel.

I like the cut of the neckline and the style of the top. The sleeves are see-through and the bodice is lined, but the texture of the fabric shows every lump and bulge beneath the material. The fit is true to size, I just don't love the "clingy" nature of the fabric.

评论概述: Cute top, runs a tiny bit small
评论详情: I ordered this top in black, in a size medium, which is my regular size.  The top fits a tiny bit small, but has a slimming, tapered look because of that. If you're in between sizes, it might be best to order a size up.  The split V neck is flattering and the sheer polka dot sleeves give this top a dressy look. The top if comfortable to wear and the 3/4 sleeves will keep them out of your food. Definitely recommend!

This is a very nice top. It is so cute with the sheer 3/4 sleeves. The fit is good, although maybe just slightly smaller than most larges are on me, but not by much. This is a nice top for casual use and will definitely be easy to dress up as well.
My blouse came in. The color was great. The size was perfect it’s comfortable and flows with me. Very pleased
The size is good however, the color is off in the picture. The shirt is a lot darker than what it looks like.

I ordered the Timeson 3/4 Sleeve Top in wine and I am pleased with its quality and its sparkle.  I cannot call it a "V Neck" however, it is more like tunic with a small V opening.  Also, this kind of straddles the area between dressy and business casual for a festive event.  I added a close up picture of the fabric.  It is a stretchy nylon, with the outer sparkly layer being a looser weave and the inner being a tighter, more clingy weave.  The arms are sheer and just a bit smaller than I thought they would be.  I am 5'5" and it hits at the top of my thighs.  It says it is machine washable, but I may not risk it with the fabrics and layers involved.
Love the way it fits.

I really like the how stylish and chic this top is. I love the design of the neckline and the sleeves. Although, for me the sleeves were a little tight. I dressed it up with black dress pants and wore it to work. I received many compliments on it.  I am 5'4" and weigh 210lbs and ordered an XXL which fit me fine (once again, sleeves were a little tight but not bad.) I usually order an XL in most of my shirts but glad I did size up on this one. The material is very good quality. I got the white and it was not sheer at all.  I love this top and I think you will too!

I'm not usually a fan of polyester, but for dressy clothing you sometimes have to make some sacrifices.  In this case, it's not much of a sacrifice because this blouse is comfy and attractive.  I expect to wear this on many Zoom calls.  Because there are two layers, you can skip the bra if you want.
This is a great shirt! Pretty, flowing, fits well, and washes well (I did hang dry). I can't wait to wear it to holiday events.

Such a beautiful shirt. Flowy and breathable. Dressy but simple. There’s so many perks to this blouse. The color is also so bright and vivid. I get many compliments when I wear this blouse and I’ll continue to wear it til I can’t anymore! Fits just right. Sizing is accurate!!

This timeless white 3/4 sleeve top is a wardrobe essential. Its versatile design makes it perfect for both casual and formal occasions. The good quality fabric is soft, comfortable, and drapes beautifully. The 3/4 sleeves offer a flattering and stylish length that can be dressed up or down. Whether I'm pairing it with jeans for a casual look or a skirt for a more formal, this top is sure to elevate my outfit.
This top is so cute. It's very flowy. It's lightweight and very comfortable. I absolutely love this color. This is great with work pants or jeans.

The fabric of this shirt is so soft and stretchy, it's probably one of the most comfortable feeling shirts I've bought on Amazon. For the comfort of the material, the price is amazing. The style is modern enough, but you could definitely make this feel very 90s goth with the right skirt or pants, given the velvet flower accents. I think you could even style this with the right skirt for a Victorian period costume, if you wanted. The shirt fits true to size, and is very accurately represented in the product photos.
Comfortable, and classic look.  Material feels nice, and has a strong feel to it.  Would buy again

The color is very pretty, I would describe it as a dark fuschia. It is designed well and hangs just right. The lace top layer adds a layer of elegance and the lace part that touches your arms is comfortable. It is super cute and also comfortable.

This blouse is beautiful!  I bought it thinking it would be a nice top to wear for a date night or even to work.  Instead I think it will be my Christmas top. It is stylish, comfortable and has a really pretty shimmer to the material. I love this.

Nice looking and fits very well. Sized as expected. Great color that doesn't fade going through normal wash cycles. Doesn't wrinkle easily. Very nice, soft fabric. Comfortable to wear. Strong, durable fabric that should last a long time.

Timeson brand clothing is a good bet when shopping online. The products are true to US sizing and are well made. This top with an embroidered overlay is great. The V-neck is flattering without being revealing and the sleeves are a good length. I really appreciate that the lining material underneath is the exact same color as the overlay and all the seams are neat and well sewn. The material of both the top and lining provide stretch. This top is versatile as it would look great to dress up jeans or with a nice skirt or slacks for a dressier look.

This top is very cute. The medium fit as expected. The fabric seems of good quality with solid stitching.  I tried to order the white but received the “wine.” I’m going to give the seller the benefit of the doubt and assume I made a mistake in ordering. With that said, the “Wine” is a nice color with a bit of a sparkly sheen. However, it seems like it has a bit of a fall / holiday / Christmas -type vibe to it.  Other than that limitation, I like it.
What a lovely casual yet dressy blouse. I love the floral theme & the 3/4 sleeved design.

评论概述: Snug on Apple shape, pretty detailing
评论详情: Please see video review with sound on for details on sizing, cut, material and design. Recap: Slim fit not flattering on apple shapes, would be lovely on ones with a trim waist.

This shirt has a beautiful shimmer to the fabric! I think it will be very elegant for any evening. We are but especially pretty to wear any time during the holiday season! The butterfly sleeve is exceptionally pretty! I did size up and I’m very glad that I did. I normally wear an extra large and I got the 2X and it fits perfect.

This top is true-to-size and features three-quarter length sleeves and a lace overlay.  The cut of the garment is flattering, with a V-neckline and a good length.  The lace overlay is subtle looking, is very soft and drapes nicely.  Very pleased!

This dressy top is nicely made, fits true to size, and has a flowing drape along the bottom.  I ordered the black with the polka-dot-look that shows up mostly in the sheer sleeves.  Made of 95% nylon, the fabric is soft and lightweight.  Up close, the fabric is a kind of netting on top with a mesh lining.  In my opinion, the top is not for casual wear as it is too dressy looking, but for holidays or evenings out, it's a go.

This is a really really nice elegant blouse to dress up in. It is made of high-quality material with very elegant lace over the top. I ordered a large but considered an extra large. The large fits just fine. As with all other shirts that I wear, I wish it could be a little bit longer. That does not take away from my review, the sleeves are adorable with a little flair on the end, the main part is body hugging, but the lace covers up what you need covered up such as a muffin top. I would recommend this shirt. It is very beautiful and classy looking.

I ordered this top in white because it seemed the least blingy, but it does still have a bit of sparkle to it, just giving it a dash of fancy. (That's what I said to myself when I pulled it from the package: "oooh, this is fancy!")  A top like this, I completely expected to be unyielding, but it's comfortably stretchy, so when you put it on or take it off, you're not worried you're suddenly going to rip a seam.  The attached undershirt is of a decent weight so it's not see-thru, and the fit was really good - just loose enough without looking baggy. Honestly, fabulous top!

Wow, this is a much nicer blouse than I expected! It's a long tunic top with an internal lining and transparent sleeves. Has a dressy sparkle design on the fabric that is eye catching. Very flattering for most figures as it's curved around the sides, and the v-neckline is not too low. The neckline itself has a suede type fabric. It flows nicely and since it's longer, can be either tucked in or worn loose over a skirt or dress pants. Very comfortable and lightweight so perfect for summer evenings out. No wrinkles at all straight out of the package.
